title: Veggie Burger
author: Chef AJ
steps: Mash beans and mix with ingredients.
Shape into patties and cook on pan.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Chef Maria
steps: Mix eggs and cheese, then combine with spaghetti and bacon.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
author: Chef John
steps: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add grilled chicken slices and croutons.
Drizzle Caesar dressing and sprinkle parmesan.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Baker Lily
steps: Mix butter and sugar, then add eggs and flour.
Scoop dough onto baking tray and bake for 12-15 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
author: Chef Emma
steps: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread avocado on toast and sprinkle chili flakes.
